pageTitle: National Rail fares, caps and Travelcards beyond Zone 9
keywords: TfL,National Rail services fares, national rail fares, outside Zone 9 fares
description: Fares for National Rail services beyond Zone 9 in London

breadcrumbs.title: National Rail fares, caps and Travelcards beyond Zone 9

title.title: National Rail fares, caps and Travelcards beyond Zone 9

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["How to pay and prices for travel on National Rail services beyond Zone 9."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"How to pay"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Single journeys"}
Find the price for a single pay as you go journey between any two stations on our single fare finder .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Pay as you go"}
You can use contactless (card or device) or an Oyster card to pay as you go for travel beyond Zone 9, to and from:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Broxbourne, Rye House, St. Margarets, Ware and Hertford East","Gatwick Airport","Merstham, Redhill, Earlswood, Salfords and Horley","Ockendon, Chafford Hundred, Purfleet and Grays","Epsom","Cuffley, Bayford and Hertford North"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"National Rail season tickets"}
Find the price for National Rail season tickets between two stations.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Travelcards"}
You can buy a Day Travelcard (paper ticket), paper point to point season ticket, or add a Travelcard season ticket to your Oyster card for travel beyond Zone 9, to and from:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Broxbourne, Rye House, St. Margarets, Ware and Hertford East"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"How much does it cost?"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Adult"}

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"16+ Zip Oyster photocard National Rail caps and Travelcard prices","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/national-rail-16-plus-fares-2019.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 26KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"11-15"}

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"11-15 Zip Oyster photocard National Rail caps and Travelcard prices","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/national-rail-11-15-zip-fares-2019.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 26KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"5-10"}

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"5-10 Zip Oyster photocard National Rail caps and Travelcard prices","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/national-rail-5-10-zip-fares-2019.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 25KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Children with a 5-10 Zip Oyster photocard can travel free on journeys to and from:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Watford Junction","Broxbourne, Hertford East, Ware, St Margarets and Rye House","Ockendon, Chafford Hundred, Purfleet and Grays"]}
Without a photocard, up to four under 11s can travel free on journeys to and from Watford Junction, if travelling with an adult using either:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Pay as you go using \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/contactless-and-mobile-pay-as-you-go\"\u003econtactless\u003c/a\u003e (card or device) or an \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/oyster-pay-as-you-go\"\u003eOyster card\u003c/a\u003e ","A valid ticket"," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/freedom-pass\"\u003eFreedom Pass\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/60-plus-oyster-photocard\"\u003e60+ London Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/veterans-oyster-photocard\"\u003eVeterans Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Check the 5-10 PDF for caps and Travelcard prices to:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Gatwick Airport","Merstham, Redhill, Earlswood, Salfords and Horley","Epsom","Cuffley, Bayford and Hertford North"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Under 5s"}
Children under 5 travel free if travelling with an adult using either:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Pay as you go using \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/contactless-and-mobile-pay-as-you-go\"\u003econtactless\u003c/a\u003e (card or device) or an \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/pay-as-you-go/oyster-pay-as-you-go\"\u003eOyster card\u003c/a\u003e ","A valid ticket"," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/freedom-pass\"\u003eFreedom Pass\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/60-plus-oyster-photocard\"\u003e60+ London Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/veterans-oyster-photocard\"\u003eVeterans Oyster photocard\u003c/a\u003e "]}
They can travel free on journeys to and from:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Watford Junction","Broxbourne, Hertford East, Ware, St Margarets and Rye House","Ockendon, Chafford Hundred, Purfleet and Grays","Gatwick Airport","Merstham, Redhill, Earlswood, Salfords and Horley","Epsom","Cuffley, Bayford and Hertford North"]}
